Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Dear Sirs and Madams, unfortunately, there are issues with the smartphone. The display shows stripes during usage of the phone. These appear differently. When I activate the screen lock, it briefly shows stripes. During normal use, the display also shows stripes intermittently. Furthermore, the maximum battery capacity is 100%. However, this cannot be the case. The battery drains quickly after a few hours, even though I'm not using the phone much. I have compared it to my first purchase (same model and lower battery capacity), and the battery lasts longer there.

I would appreciate a prompt response. I was very satisfied with my first order from you. However, this second order is very disappointing. I hope we can find a solution for this, as that's a lot of money I paid here. Additionally, I would like to remain a customer at your store.

Best regards,
Arnold Weber

Hello Arnold,

You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: 

Before you prepare your return:
1. Check out these instructions on how to return an item: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions
2. Don't forget to include all accessories that came with the product
3. Remove any existing protective film or cover
4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below

How to pack the product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with the product lying flat so it doesn't move during transit.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare sticker inside in case the original one gets lost or damaged).
• Take a photo of the package from both inside and out before shipping. This will protect you in case the product is damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care
